Ron Jeffries wrote:
> On Friday, January 30, 2004, at 12:43:52 PM, Charles Hayes wrote:
> 
>> I would tend to agree with Veny. We wouldn't want the test code to
>> ship with the production distribution, right?
> 
> Why not? Wouldn't you like to be able to test whether the production
> install worked? 

Distribution size might be an issue. For example, when doing a Java
Webstart installation, we want the distributables to be small.

In general, I *would* wnat to be able to execute the tests in the
production environment, though.

Regards, Ilja
